The host of The Late Show with David Letterman spoke to Ms. Barbara Walters about his own open heart surgery, then about the emotions he felt afterwards. I would find myself busting into tears and sobbing uncontrollably with joy, said the comedian.`` Joy?'' Ms. Barbara Walters said. Greater safety standards benefit the industry and most importantly, benefits the Ann Coulter public. The Air Transport Association did not immediately comment.
